Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

  • Q: What is the policy of the Consumer Protection Council and how they protect every consumer?

    The Consumer Protection Council is mandated to do a couple of things in porder to ensure that every consumer gets a satisfied treatment from the service providers that they get services from.

  • Q: What exactly are the terms of use for the CPC?

    The Consumer Protection Council stands as a bridge between two parties (the consumer and the service providers) without being biased.
